name: Rahul Sharma
summary: Enthusiastic, impact oriented, and problem solving ML engineer with leadership skills. Have 9+ years of work experience ranging from formulating ideas to shipping models. Expertise in speech, deep learning, C++,  python, and systems. Passionate about creating positive changes in human lives by using ML and other AI techniques.

technical.Languages: Python, C++, Js, C, C#, Java, R

publication.areas: NLP, ML, Image Processing, GPU computing

declaration: I solemnly declare that all the above information is correct to the best of my knowledge and belief.

experiences.title: Senior ML Scientist
projects: Devised Ludo (a board game) AI with different strategies against human opponents
Implemented skill based matchmaking system for RMG apps

experiences.title: Manager Data Scientist
projects: Led a team of 3 data scientists, handling services and data pipeline for the medical industry
Developed novel phonetic-embeddings for command model, surpassing SOTA by 12%
Devised framework for training and deployment, which reduces experimentation time by 40%
Improved STT performance in noisy environments by replacing MFCC with ED based features

experiences.title: Research Software Engineer II
projects: Developed Silence detection (VAD) for server and mobile (OpenCL), used by millions of users every day
Single-handedly devised a C++ library to port TF models to any target platform such as ARM/Intel and CPU/GPU, saving server cost for the company and improving user experience

experiences.title: Independent Applied Scientist
projects: Devised course recommendation model to maximizing employment in blue-collar jobs market
Implemented a generic inference engine for semantic analysis on large scale Knowledge-Graph
Developed face search app for missing people on the Android platform for a public sector client

experiences.title: Applied Scientist
projects: Trained Ad click-prediction models for the European market as a part of the Ranking team
Developed supervised semantic word-embeddings yielding new text similarity feature
Devised a highly parallel SGD framework in C++ for big data, reducing training time by 6 fold

experiences.title: Intern
projects: Project: Mobile Data Services using Open Protocols and Internet over Bluetooth (paper)
